plot: The U.S. Pacific submarine fleet was all that was available in the early days of America's involvement in World War 2 and it took the fight to the Japanese with great success.
title: The Story of Submarine Warfare in the Pacific
plot_es: The U.S. Pacific submarine fleet was all that was available in the early days of America's involvement in World War 2 and it took the fight to the Japanese with great success.
original_name: The Story of Submarine Warfare in the Pacific
